alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 07 at 2:42PM AKST until January 10 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Buildings could be damaged. Travel could be difficult. Blowing snow could cause areas of low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong and gusty northeast winds are expected to develop late Saturday and continue into late Sunday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
